definition: to gush/to squirt/to surge/to well out/to overflow
(of a smell) strong/peak season (of a crop)/(classifier for the ordinal number of a crop, in the context of multiple harvests)
meager/slight/weak/ungenerous or unkind/frivolous/to despise/to belittle/to look down on/to approach or near
to be on the verge of eruption (idiom)/(of the sun) to emerge in all its brilliance

sentences.english: Inspiration might come from someplace you never imagined.
sentences.chinese: 靈感可能從任何你想也想不到的地方噴薄而發。

sentences.english: If my missing spurts out, I will not tell you.
sentences.chinese: 如果我的想念噴薄而出，我不會告訴你。

sentences.english: But in the Chu culture, life can be gushing.
sentences.chinese: 但是在楚文化裏，生命是可以噴薄的。

sentences.english: Her volcano belched a staggering mount of fire, smoke, and ashes.
sentences.chinese: 她的火山噴薄出讓人害怕的火花，煙霧和灰燼。

sentences.english: This power becomes available once you have changed your way of thinking.
sentences.chinese: 一旦你換個角度思考問題，這種力量將噴薄而出。

sentences.english: I couldn't hold back, tears gushing out.
sentences.chinese: 我再也控制不住，淚水噴薄而出。

sentences.english: Eventually we'll have holographic images bursting out of your TV.
sentences.chinese: 最終，我們將使全息影像在電視屏幕上噴薄而出。

sentences.english: Who knows what creative thought might come of it?
sentences.chinese: 誰知道會有怎樣的奇思妙想噴薄而出呢？

sentences.english: The sound of water and air spraying out with one giant breath into the atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 水和空氣的聲音噴薄而來，營造了一種特定的氛圍。

sentences.english: Blood gushing out of light, the first wisp of sunshine.
sentences.chinese: 血光噴薄之後，露出清晨第一縷陽光。

sentences.english: We are greeting the rising sunrise of the year 2008.
sentences.chinese: 我們將迎來2008年噴薄而出的朝陽。

sentences.english: The rim of the sun was blazing up over a sharp horizon .
sentences.chinese: 輪廓鮮明的地平線上，一輪旭日噴薄欲出。

sentences.english: I will it, the poison could break through, blue-black , and.
sentences.chinese: 如果我願意，毒液可噴薄而出，藍黑色。

sentences.english: We are greeting the rising sunrise of the year 2007.
sentences.chinese: 我們將迎來2007年噴薄而出的朝陽。
